lessons.japanese: この決定は諸君全部を拘束するものではない。
lessons.english: This decision is not binding on all of you.

lessons.japanese: この義務は諸君のすべてに果たしてもらわねばならぬ。
lessons.english: The duty must be discharged by every one of you.

lessons.japanese: 諸君全員がそれを読まなければならない。
lessons.english: All of you have to read it.

lessons.japanese: 諸君は人類の利益のために働くべきだ。
lessons.english: You should work in the interests of humanity.

lessons.japanese: 諸君、ちょっと御挨拶申し上げます。
lessons.english: Gentlemen, allow me to say a few words in greeting.

lessons.japanese: 私は諸君のすべてを知っているわけではない。
lessons.english: I don't know every one of you.

lessons.japanese: この決定は諸君全部を拘束するものではない。
lessons.english: This decision is not binding on all of you.

lessons.japanese: この義務は諸君のすべてに果たしてもらわねばならぬ。
lessons.english: The duty must be discharged by every one of you.
